change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 97/2012, effective June 1, 2012.

section.sectiontext: Each helmet described in the following schedule is designated as an approved motorcycle safety helmet.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 24/86.
content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Motor Vehicle Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 318, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 221 (2)]
